name: Noah: The Animal Lover
description:
Noah: The Animal Lover is a school project that was developed by seven class mates. This was our very first game made with Unreal Engine 4 and we had six weeks to complete the project.

You play as a man named Noah and your mission is to rescue animals from an old abandoned zoo. In order to get all the animals you will need to get past a variety of platforming challenges with different environments.
